NAME: Spicy Vegan Chili
STEPS: First, chop up onions, bell peppers, and garlic.
In a large pot, sauté the onions, bell peppers, and garlic until they're softened.
Add chili powder, cumin, oregano, and salt, and stir well.
Add canned tomatoes, kidney beans, black beans, and corn. Mix them well.
Simmer for 30-45 minutes until flavors are well combined.
Serve with your choice of toppings like avocado slices, green onions, or vegan sour cream.

NAME: Sweet Banana Pancakes
STEPS: First, in a large bowl, mash the bananas until smooth.
Add eggs, milk, vanilla extract, and mix well.
In another bowl, mix together flour, baking powder, and salt.
Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet ingredients, mixing just until combined.
Heat a non-stick skillet over medium heat, add batter by 1/4 cupfuls and cook until bubbles form on top, then flip and cook until the other side is golden brown.
Serve with maple syrup or your choice of toppings.

NAME: Refreshing Summer Gazpacho
STEPS: First, chop the cucumber, bell peppers, tomatoes, and red onions into 1-inch cubes.
Put each vegetable separately into a food processor fitted with a steel blade and pulse until it is coarsely chopped. Do not over-process!
After each vegetable is processed, combine them in a large bowl and add the garlic, tomato juice, vinegar, olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Mix well and chill before serving. The longer gazpacho sits, the more the flavors develop.

NAME: Savory Beef Stroganoff
STEPS: First, in a large skillet, cook the beef until browned. Set aside.
In the same skillet, add the butter, onions, and mushrooms. Sauté until onions are tender.
Stir in flour until blended. Gradually stir in beef broth. Bring to a boil; cook and stir for 2 minutes or until thickened.
Add the beef back into the skillet. Stir in sour cream and heat through (do not boil).
Serve over noodles or rice.

NAME: Sweet Apple Crisp
STEPS: First, preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
In a large bowl, mix together apples, sugar, cinnamon, and flour. Pour into a 9x13 inch baking dish.
In the same bowl, combine oats, flour, brown sugar, baking powder, baking soda, and melted butter. Crumble evenly over the apple mixture.
Bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for about 45 minutes or until the top is golden and the apples are tender.

NAME: Premium Lobster Bisque
STEPS: First, melt the butter in a large pot over medium heat.
Add the lobster shells and cook until they are bright red. Then add the onions, carrots, and celery and sauté until the onions are translucent.
Add the tomato paste and cook for another 3-4 minutes.
Add the cognac and let it simmer until the alcohol has evaporated.
Add the fish stock and the bouquet garni. Let it simmer for 20 minutes.
Strain the mixture and return the liquid to the pot. Add the cream and lobster meat and let it simmer for another 5 minutes.
Season with salt and pepper. Serve hot.

NAME: Fluffy Japanese Pancakes
STEPS: First, separate egg yolks and whites into two different bowls.
Whisk the egg yolks with sugar, milk, and vanilla extract.
Add flour to the egg yolk mixture and mix well until no lumps are left.
Beat the egg whites with a mixer until stiff peaks form.
Slowly fold the egg whites into the yolk mixture.
Cook on a low heat in a frying pan, add batter to fill the pancake molds, cover and cook for about 10 minutes. Flip and cook for another 5 minutes.
Serve with syrup and fresh fruits.

NAME: Vegan Avocado Toast
STEPS: First, toast the bread in a toaster.
Mash the avocado with a fork and add lemon juice and salt.
Spread the mashed avocado on the toast.
Top with cherry tomatoes and a sprinkle of sesame seeds. Serve immediately.

NAME: Chicken Alfredo Pasta
STEPS: First, cook the chicken in a pan until browned and set aside.
Cook the pasta in a pot of boiling water until al dente.
In a separate pan, melt butter and add garlic, cooking until fragrant.
Add cream and parmesan to the butter and garlic, stirring until the cheese is melted.
Add the cooked chicken and pasta, mixing well to coat.
Serve immediately with a sprinkle of chopped parsley.

NAME: Classic Margherita Pizza
STEPS: First, preheat your oven to the highest setting.
Roll out your pizza dough on a floured surface.
Spread tomato sauce over the dough, leaving a border for the crust.
Top with sliced mozzarella and fresh basil leaves.
Bake in the oven until the crust is golden and the cheese is bubbling and slightly browned.
Drizzle with a little extra virgin olive oil before serving.

NAME: Classic French Ratatouille
STEPS: First, heat olive oil in a large pan over medium heat.
Add the onions and garlic, cook until fragrant.
Add the eggplant, cook until it's softened.
Add the zucchini, bell peppers and tomatoes, cook until all the vegetables are tender.
Stir in the basil, thyme, salt, and pepper, then reduce the heat to low, cover, and let it simmer for about 15 minutes.
Serve hot.

NAME: Viet'name'se Pho
STEPS: First, simmer the beef bones in a large pot of water.
Add the onions, ginger, salt, star anise, and cloves, continue to simmer for about 2-3 hours.
Strain the broth, and add fish sauce, sugar, and salt.
Prepare rice noodles according to the package instructions.
Serve the broth with noodles, topped with thinly sliced beef, onions, and fresh herbs.

NAME: Chocolate Chip Cookies
STEPS: First, preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
Cream together the butter and sugars in a large mixing bowl.
Beat in the eggs and vanilla extract.
In a separate bowl, combine the flour, baking soda, and salt, then gradually add it to the butter mixture.
Fold in the chocolate chips.
Drop rounded tablespoonfuls onto ungreased baking sheets, and bake for 9-11 minutes or until golden brown.
Let them cool on wire racks.

NAME: Greek Salad
STEPS: First, chop the tomatoes, cucumbers, onions, and feta cheese into bite-size pieces.
Combine the chopped ingredients in a large bowl.
Add the olives and toss lightly.
Whisk together the olive oil, lemon juice, and oregano, then pour over the salad.
Season with salt and pepper, toss until well combined, and serve.

NAME: Spicy Tofu Stir Fry
STEPS: First, press tofu to remove excess moisture and cut into cubes.
Heat oil in a pan over medium heat.
Add tofu to the pan and fry until golden brown on all sides. Remove from the pan and set aside.
In the same pan, add garlic, ginger, and chili, cook until fragrant.
Return tofu to the pan, add soy sauce, vinegar, and sugar. Stir well to combine.
Add scallions and sesame seeds, stir to combine, and cook for another minute.
Serve hot.

NAME: Grilled Salmon with Lemon and Dill
STEPS: First, preheat your grill to medium-high heat.
Season the salmon fillets with salt and pepper, then squeeze lemon juice over them and sprinkle with dill.
Place the salmon fillets on the grill, skin side down, and cook for about 5-7 minutes per side, or until the fish is opaque and flaky.
Serve hot.

NAME: Classic Cheesecake
STEPS: First, preheat your oven to 325°F (160°C).
Mix the graham cracker crumbs, melted butter, and sugar, then press into the bottom of a springform pan.
Beat the cream cheese until smooth, then beat in the sugar, eggs, vanilla, and lemon zest.
Pour the mixture over the crust in the pan.
Bake for 50-60 minutes, or until the center is set and the top is slightly browned.
Let it cool in the pan on a wire rack, then refrigerate for at least 4 hours before serving.

NAME: Guacamole
STEPS: First, cut the avocados in half, remove the pit, and scoop the flesh into a bowl.
Mash the avocado with a fork until it's as smooth or chunky as you like.
Stir in the onion, tomato, cilantro, lime juice, and salt.
Serve immediately, or cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate to let the flavors meld together.

NAME: Pumpkin Soup
STEPS: First, peel and chop the pumpkin, potato, and onion.
Heat oil in a large pot, add the onion and cook until translucent.
Add the pumpkin and potato to the pot and cover with vegetable broth. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer until the vegetables are tender.
Blend the soup until smooth, then season with salt and pepper.
Serve hot, garnished with pumpkin seeds if desired.

NAME: Beef Tacos
STEPS: First, brown the ground beef in a skillet over medium heat, breaking it up as it cooks.
Add the taco seasoning and water, then simmer until the liquid has evaporated.
Heat the taco shells in the oven according to package instructions.
Fill the taco shells with the beef mixture, then top with lettuce, tomato, cheese, and any other desired toppings.
Serve immediately.

NAME: French Onion Soup
STEPS: First, slice the onions and cook them in a large pot with melted butter until they're caramelized.
Add the beef broth, wine, and thyme to the pot, bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for about 20 minutes.
Ladle the soup into oven-safe bowls, top each with a slice of baguette and some grated cheese, then broil until the cheese is bubbly and golden.
Serve hot.

NAME: Matcha Green Tea Ice Cream
STEPS: First, whisk together the almond milk, sugar, and matcha powder until well combined.
Pour the mixture into an ice cream maker and churn according to manufacturer's instructions.
Once churned, transfer the ice cream to a lidded container and freeze until firm.
Serve cold.

NAME: Chicken Caesar Salad
STEPS: First, grill or pan-fry the chicken until fully cooked, then slice it into strips.
Toss the romaine lettuce with Caesar dressing in a large bowl.
Top the lettuce with the chicken strips, croutons, and shaved Parmesan cheese.
Serve cold.

NAME: Shrimp Scampi
STEPS: First, sauté the garlic in butter and olive oil until fragrant.
Add the shrimp and cook until pink, then remove them from the pan.
Deglaze the pan with white wine and lemon juice, then return the shrimp to the pan.
Stir in the parsley, then serve the shrimp scampi over cooked pasta.
Serve hot.

NAME: Vegan Banana Bread
STEPS: First, mash the bananas in a large bowl, then stir in the sugar, vegetable oil, and vanilla.
Mix in the flour, baking soda, and salt, then fold in the chopped walnuts.
Pour the batter into a loaf pan and bake at 350°F (175°C) for about 60 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
Allow to cool in the pan for a few minutes, then remove and cool completely on a wire rack.
Serve warm or at room temperature.

NAME: Beef Bulgogi
STEPS: First, marinate the thinly sliced beef in soy sauce, sugar, sesame oil, garlic, and pepper for at least an hour.
Heat a pan over medium-high heat, then add the beef and cook until browned.
Serve the beef bulgogi over steamed rice with kimchi and other side dishes.

NAME: Chicken Carbonara
STEPS: First, cook the spaghetti according to the package instructions, then drain and set aside.
Cook the bacon until crispy, then remove from the pan and set aside.
In the same pan, cook the chicken until browned, then add the garlic and cook until fragrant.
Beat the eggs with the Parmesan cheese and a little black pepper, then add to the pan and stir until the eggs thicken but are still creamy.
Add the cooked spaghetti and bacon to the pan and toss to combine.
Serve the chicken carbonara hot with extra Parmesan cheese on top.

NAME: Chicken Katsu
STEPS: First, season the chicken with salt and pepper, then dredge in flour, dip in beaten eggs, and coat with panko breadcrumbs.
Heat oil in a pan over medium heat, then fry the chicken until golden brown.
Slice the chicken katsu into strips and serve over steamed rice with katsu sauce.

NAME: Pesto Pasta
STEPS: First, cook the pasta according to the package instructions, then drain and set aside.
In a blender or food processor, combine the basil, garlic, pine nuts, Parmesan cheese, olive oil, salt, and pepper, then blend until smooth.
Toss the cooked pasta with the pesto, then serve the pesto pasta hot with extra Parmesan cheese on top.

NAME: Chicken Quesadillas
STEPS: First, cook the chicken until browned, then add the bell peppers and onions and cook until soft.
Spread a layer of cheese on one half of each tortilla, then top with the chicken and vegetable mixture and fold in half.
Cook the quesadillas in a pan over medium heat until the cheese is melted and the tortillas are crispy.
Serve the chicken quesadillas hot with salsa and sour cream.

NAME: Fried Rice
STEPS: First, cook the rice according to the package instructions, then set aside.
Heat oil in a pan over medium heat, then add the garlic and onions and cook until soft.
Add the cooked rice, peas, carrots, soy sauce, and scrambled eggs, then stir until well combined.
Serve the fried rice hot with a sprinkle of green onions on top.

NAME: Lemon Seafood Risotto
STEPS: First, heat the oil in a large saucepan, then add the onions and garlic and cook until soft.
Add the rice and cook until translucent, then add the wine and cook until absorbed.
Gradually add the broth, stirring constantly, until the rice is cooked.
Add the shrimp, scallops, lemon zest, lemon juice, and parsley, then cook until the seafood is cooked through.
Serve the lemon seafood risotto hot with a sprinkle of Parmesan cheese on top.

NAME: Lobster Ravioli
STEPS: First, prepare the ravioli dough and set it aside.
Next, cook the lobster in boiling water until it is fully cooked and let it cool.
Remove the meat from the lobster and chop it finely.
Combine the chopped lobster with ricotta, Parmesan, and herbs.
Place a spoonful of the lobster mixture on each piece of ravioli dough and fold over, sealing the edges.
Cook the ravioli in boiling water until they float.
Serve with a butter and herb sauce.

NAME: Grilled Garlic Shrimp
STEPS: First, mix together the garlic, olive oil, lemon juice, and spices.
Marinate the shrimp in the garlic mixture for at least 30 minutes.
Skewer the shrimp and grill until pink and opaque.
Serve the grilled garlic shrimp hot with fresh lemon wedges.

NAME: British Fish Cake
STEPS: First, boil the fish until it is fully cooked, then flake it with a fork.
Mix the flaked fish with mashed potatoes and herbs.
Form the mixture into patties and coat with bread crumbs.
Fry the fish cakes until golden brown.
Serve the British fish cakes hot with tartar sauce.

NAME: Churros
STEPS: First, heat the water, sugar, salt, and oil in a pot until boiling.
Add the flour and stir until a dough forms.
Pipe the dough through a star-shaped nozzle into hot oil.
Fry the churros until golden brown, then drain on paper towels.
Roll the churros in sugar and cinnamon.
Serve the churros hot with chocolate sauce.

NAME: Chicken Pot Pie
STEPS: First, cook the chicken in a pot until it's fully cooked and cut it into bite-sized pieces.
Saute the vegetables in a pan until they are soft.
Add the chicken and vegetables to a pie crust and cover it with another crust, making sure to seal the edges.
Bake in the oven until the crust is golden brown.
Serve the chicken pot pie hot.

NAME: Spaghetti Aglio e Olio
STEPS: First, cook the spaghetti in boiling water until al dente.
In a separate pan, saute the garlic in olive oil until golden brown.
Add red pepper flakes and remove from heat.
Toss the cooked spaghetti in the garlic oil.
Serve the spaghetti aglio e olio hot, sprinkled with parsley.

NAME: Roasted Chicken
STEPS: First, season the chicken with salt, pepper, and herbs.
Place the chicken in a roasting pan and bake in the oven until the skin is crispy and the chicken is fully cooked.
Let the chicken rest for a few minutes before carving.
Serve the roasted chicken hot with your choice of sides.

NAME: Beef Lasagna
STEPS: First, prepare the meat sauce by sauteing ground beef with onions, garlic, tomatoes, and herbs.
In a separate bowl, mix together ricotta cheese, eggs, and herbs.
Layer the lasagna noodles, meat sauce, ricotta mixture, and mozzarella cheese in a baking dish.
Bake in the oven until the cheese is bubbly and browned.
Serve the lasagna hot.

NAME: Beef Stew
STEPS: First, brown the beef in a pot with oil.
Remove the beef and sauté onions, carrots, and celery.
Return the beef to the pot and add broth, potatoes, and herbs.
Simmer until the beef and vegetables are tender.
Serve the beef stew hot with bread.

NAME: Mac and Cheese
STEPS: First, cook the macaroni according to the package instructions.
In a separate pot, melt the butter and add the flour to make a roux.
Add milk to the roux and stir until the sauce thickens.
Remove from heat and stir in the cheese until it melts.
Combine the cheese sauce with the cooked macaroni.
Serve the mac and cheese hot.

NAME: Orange Cinnamon Rolls
STEPS: First, prepare the dough and let it rise.
Roll out the dough and spread the filling of sugar, cinnamon, and orange zest.
Roll up the dough and cut into rolls.
Bake the rolls in the oven until golden brown.
While the rolls are cooling, prepare the icing with powdered sugar and orange juice.
Drizzle the icing over the cinnamon rolls.
Serve the orange cinnamon rolls warm or at room temperature.

NAME: Fish Tacos
STEPS: First, season the fish with spices and grill.
In a separate bowl, prepare the slaw with cabbage, lime juice, and mayo.
Warm the tortillas in a pan.
Assemble the tacos with the grilled fish, slaw, and any additional toppings.
Serve the fish tacos immediately.

NAME: Roasted Rack of Lamb
STEPS: First, season the rack of lamb with herbs and garlic.
Roast in the oven until desired doneness.
Let the lamb rest before slicing into individual chops.
Serve the roasted rack of lamb with vegetables.

NAME: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
STEPS: First, butter one side of each slice of bread.
Place cheese between the non-buttered sides of the bread.
Grill the sandwich in a pan until golden brown and the cheese is melted.
Serve the grilled cheese sandwich hot.

NAME: Tomato Soup
STEPS: First, sauté onions and garlic in a pot.
Add tomatoes, broth, and herbs.
Simmer until the tomatoes are soft.
Blend the soup until smooth.
Serve the tomato soup hot with bread.

NAME: Banana Smoothie
STEPS: First, combine bananas, yogurt, and honey in a blender.
Blend until smooth.
Serve the banana smoothie immediately.

NAME: Italian Baked Meatballs
STEPS: First, combine ground meat with breadcrumbs, parmesan, and spices.
Shape the mixture into meatballs and place on a baking sheet.
Bake in the oven until cooked through.
Serve the Italian baked meatballs with pasta and marinara sauce.

NAME: Blueberry Yogurt Smoothie
STEPS: First, combine blueberries, yogurt, and honey in a blender.
Blend until smooth.
Serve the blueberry yogurt smoothie immediately.

NAME: Black Bean Veggie Burger
STEPS: First, mash black beans and combine with vegetables and spices.
Shape the mixture into patties and grill.
Serve the black bean veggie burger with a bun and your favorite toppings.

NAME: French Toast
STEPS: First, whisk together eggs, milk, and cinnamon.
Dip slices of bread into the mixture.
Fry the bread in a pan until golden brown.
Serve the French toast with maple syrup and powdered sugar.

NAME: BLT Sandwich
STEPS: First, fry bacon until crispy.
Assemble the sandwich with bread, bacon, lettuce, and tomato.
Add mayo for extra flavor.
Serve the BLT sandwich immediately.

NAME: Baked Potatoes
STEPS: First, clean the potatoes and pierce them with a fork.
Bake in the oven until they are soft.
Serve the baked potatoes with butter and chives.

NAME: Denver Omelet
STEPS: First, sauté diced onion, bell pepper, and ham.
Beat eggs and pour them over the sautéed mixture.
Flip the omelet and allow it to cook fully.
Serve the Denver Omelet hot with toast.

NAME: Southwestern Burrito
STEPS: First, cook the rice and beans together.
Sauté onion, bell pepper, and beef.
Assemble the burrito with rice, beans, sautéed mixture, and cheese.
Grill the burrito until it is crispy and golden.
Serve the Southwestern Burrito with salsa and sour cream.

NAME: Croissant French Toast
STEPS: First, slice the croissants in half.
Dip the croissants into a mixture of beaten egg, milk, and vanilla.
Fry the croissants until golden brown.
Serve the Croissant French Toast with syrup and fresh fruits.

NAME: PB&J Smoothie
STEPS: Combine strawberries, milk, peanut butter, blue agave, and flax seeds in a blender and blend until well combined.
Substitute 2 tablespoons powdered peanut butter mixed with 1 1/2 tablespoons water for the peanut butter, if desired.
Using frozen strawberries eliminates the use of ice. Swap out the strawberries for blackberries, raspberries, or blueberries.

NAME: Pork cutlet curry with rice
STEPS: Water and potatoes in a pan. Boil the carrots and add onions and bell peppers when the carrots and potatoes are cooked.When the bell pepper, onion, and curry are cooked, add the folded curry in the water and dissolve it to complete the curry.Curry with pork cutlet gives you a wonderful taste with just vegetables.
Curry concentration improves when the ratio of curry and water is right. If cooked too bluish, fold the curry in cold water. When cooked thickly, add more water and boil to adjust the concentration.

Hitting pork with a hammer softens the texture of the meat and makes it a more delicious pork cutlet, but hammering at home is never easy. Fragments of meat fry in all directions and turn into tatters. The sirloin removes the fat and cuts the tendon in between. You have to cut it so that the meat doesn't shrink when fried. Press lightly using clean plastic or wrap, apply minced garlic, sprinkle a little pepper, sprinkle a little salt, and let it ripen for about 30 minutes.
Coat the marinated meat with flour, egg wash, and cover with raw bread crumbs.Cover the meat with bread crumbs and press lightly to complete the pork cutlet.
Fry the finished pork cutlet with 165 degrees of oil, and remove the oil slightly from the fried pork cutlet and cut it into bite-sized pieces.
Put the rice in a bowl, place the chopped pork cutlet on the rice, and pour the boiled curry slightly.

NAME: Baked Potaotes
STEPS: First, clean the potatoes and pierce them with a fork.
Bake in the oven until they are soft.
Serve the baked potatoes with butter and chives.
